original_text: Their prayers mean nothing. Almighty God does not even listen to them. Their prayers mean nothing. Almighty God does not even listen to them. Their prayers mean nothing.
korean_text: 헛된 것은 하나님이 결코 듣지 아니하시며 전능자가 돌아보지 아니하심이라

sentences.original_text: Almighty God does not even listen to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 하나님은 그들에게 귀조차 기울이지 않으십니다.

sentences.original_text: Almighty God does not even listen to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 하나님은 그들에게 귀조차 기울이지 않으십니다.
